net.proteusframework.form.registration

Class FormElementRegistration<T extends com.i2rd.componentfactory.factory.ComponentFactory>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.form.registration.FormElementRegistration<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the component factory type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.proteusframework.core.locale.OptionallyLocalizedNamedObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFormElementRegistration

    public abstract class FormElementRegistration<T extends com.i2rd.componentfactory.factory.ComponentFactory>
extends Object
implements net.proteusframework.core.locale.OptionallyLocalizedNamedObject
    Registers a ComponentFactory implementation with the intent of being used in a FormEditor. Implementations provide classification information, and view/edit UI components for a Form Element.

    Implementations should register themselves as spring beans either through annotations or in a spring bean XML file like cmsComponentFactory.spring.xml.

    Author:
    Pat Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • createComponentFactory

        public abstract T createComponentFactory()
        Create the component factory for addition to the form.

      • createEditor

        public abstract com.i2rd.componentfactory.form.editor.FormElementEditor<T> createEditor(T factory,
                                                                      com.i2rd.componentfactory.form.editor.FormEditorContext context)
                                                                                                                                            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Create an editor for the component factory. Pay particular attention to FormEditorContext.isSafeEditMode() and disable any actions that may cause problems for published revisions and the associated data.
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory.
        context - the editing context.
        Returns:
        FormElementEditor.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if this registration does not support the given factory.

      • getCategory

        public abstract net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedObjectKey getCategory()
        Get the category of the element.
        Returns:
        LocalizedObjectKey.

      • hasEditor

        public abstract boolean hasEditor(com.i2rd.componentfactory.factory.ComponentFactory factory)
        Indicates if this registration has an editor for the given component factory.
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory, already narrowed.
        Returns:
        true if an editor is available for the factory.

      • isNewElementAllowed

        public boolean isNewElementAllowed()
        Indicates if the form editor should allow new elements to be created from this registration. If false, the registration is used for existing elements only.
        Returns:
        whether new elements may be created
